articles.author: Irina Slav
articles.title: Oil Prices Continue to Advance as Bullish Sentiment Takes Hold - OilPrice.com
articles.description: Oil prices have held onto their gains from last week and were moving higher in early morning trade on Monday, a sign that bullish sentiment is back.

articles.title: Fed will have to keep rates high for longer than markets anticipate, say economists - Financial Times
articles.description: FT-Chicago Booth poll suggests bank will make two or fewer cuts this year, with the first between July and September
